availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John W. Gregory (Union County, Kentucky, clerk and sheriff)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, clerk and sheriff. Kentucky native. Married to Virginia A. Henry Gregory. Father of Charles P. Gregory, Richard L. Gregory, and Anne Gregory. Clerk in Union County in 1860. Sheriff of Union County in 1865.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Union County, p. 157; Find A Grave, "John W. Gregory (1831-1888)," Memorial #106478234, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=106478234&ref=acom (accessed May 5, 2017).
